title: Ticket #3729: Missing man pages from the packages
description:
Looks like several man pages are missing from the tarballs and packages. 

   bosco_cluster
bosco_findplatform
bosco_install
bosco_ssh_start
bosco_start
bosco_stop
bosco_uninstall
condor_drain
condor_glidein
condor_install
condor_load_history
condor_ping
condor_rmdir
condor_tail
condor_who
remarks:
2013-Jun-28 17:59:05 by tannenba:
Ok, think I found/fixed the problem, assigning to TimT for review.

2013-Jul-01 10:39:07 by tim:
CODE REVIEW: Missing man pages added to the MANPAGES variable in the documentation Makefile. Looks good.

2013-Jul-01 13:41:45 by tim:
I checked the build packages and the man pages are present.
